text: Einar Østby (17 September 1935 – 3 April 2022) was a Norwegian cross-country skier. He competed during the early 1960s. He earned a silver in the 4 × 10 km relay at the 1960 Winter Olympics. He was born in Vinger, Norway. Østby died on 3 April 2022, at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for Norway Category:Norwegian skiers
title: Einar Østby
